duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and communicate with suppliers to ensure just in time delivery of components for vehicle production.
Analyze abnormal conditions in the supply chain and decide recovery options to avoid plant downtime.
Manage inventory and monitor KPIs to meet production targets with zero impact.
Participate in decision-making meetings and present solutions based on Toyota Way principles.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (or higher) in Supply Chain, Engineering, Mathematics, or Information Technology (Master's preferred)
